audioText: Marc ira en vacances en Espagne cet été avec sa famille.
question: What will Marc do this summer?
options: He will go on vacation to Spain with his family
He will work in Spain for the summer
He will study Spanish language this summer
He will visit friends in Spain for a weekend
explanation: The sentence uses 'ira' (future tense of aller - to go). Marc will go on vacation to Spain this summer with his family.
